item.title: Kojagiri Poornima
item.description:
Bathed in Moonlight: Unveiling the Magic of Kojagiri Poornima

Have you ever felt the magic of a full moon night, where the world seems bathed in an ethereal glow? Imagine that feeling amplified, infused with centuries of tradition, and brimming with hope for prosperity. That, my friends, is the essence of Kojagiri Poornima. It’s more than just a festival; itâ€™s an experience, a tapestry woven with folklore, family, and the shimmering blessings of Goddess Lakshmi.
